effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. If any friendly Pokémon used this move earlier this turn or on the previous turn, that use’s power is added to this move’s power, to a maximum of 200.
effect.the_teal_mask: Inflicts regular damage. If any friendly Pokémon used this move earlier this turn or on the previous turn, that use’s power is added to this move’s power, to a maximum of 200.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Inflicts regular damage. If any friendly Pokémon used this move earlier this turn or on the previous turn, that use’s power is added to this move’s power, to a maximum of 200.
effect.legends_za: Inflicts regular damage. If any friendly Pokémon used this move earlier this turn or on the previous turn, that use’s power is added to this move’s power, to a maximum of 200.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Power increases by 100% for each consecutive use by any friendly Pokémon, to a maximum of 200.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Power increases by 100% for each consecutive use by any friendly Pokémon, to a maximum of 200.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Power increases by 100% for each consecutive use by any friendly Pokémon, to a maximum of 200.
short_effect.legends_za: Power increases by 100% for each consecutive use by any friendly Pokémon, to a maximum of 200.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used consecutively by any Pokémon, its power is boosted.
